plugin.name: Publons Reviewer Recognition
plugin.summary: This plugin enables integration with Publons Reviewer Recognition Service. To install and use this plugin you must first purchase the Publons Reviewer Recognition Service.
plugin.description:
Publons Reviewer Recognition Service is a third-party workflow solution allowing you to provide your reviewers with the opportunity to gain recognition for their reviews on Publons.

To install and use this plugin you must first purchase the Publons Reviewer Recognition Service. To do this please register your interest by visiting https://publons.com/benefits/publishers/. The Publons team will then be in touch to discuss your options and provide further instructions on how to integrate your journal with Publons Reviewer Recognition.
